summary: The diff only updates `project_state.json` to record the request as pending; it does not add `backend/types.mo` or any Motoko type aliases, so none of the backend requirements are implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata about expanded whisper functionality and the Profile page infinite spinner known issue.
